Zhaojiazhai Coal Mine is an underground coal mine located in Xinzheng, Henan Province, China

operators: Henan Xinzheng Coal and Electricity Company
web_search_companies.notes: The mine is operated by Henan Xinzheng Coal and Electricity Company, which is a subsidiary of Zhengzhou Coal Industry Group.
